poll_list.title: MMM Workstream S14 Budget Request
poll_list.body:
The MMM workstream is requesting a total of $841,024 (Amount will be converted to GTC value at the time of proposal vote on Tally) for Season 14

✨ tl;dr ✨

The efforts of the Memes, Merch, & Marketing workstream continue! Our highest priority of Season 14 will be to maximize the impact of Grants 2.0 and marketing GR14.

Our focus this season is on the following four objectives:

🌱 Lay the foundation to reposition Gitcoin as the premier ecosystem building & funding protocol
👀 Increase awareness & affinity for public goods funding & Gitcoin’s role in it
🌟 Elevate the Gitcoin brand experience
🏗 Establish systems, processes and practices to shape a thriving MMM and GitcoinDAO community

📜 Please find our full proposal here: https://bit.ly/MMMS14budget

We are grateful for the ongoing support from the community. 🤖 ❤️
poll_list.author: 0x4a5B536A613E69F43a52f6Aa7A7F3765428329ad
